meeting_request.purpose: Need help improving writing skills in my major
meeting_request.description: Hi, I'm Brandon, a junior majoring in English. I’ve been doing okay academically, but lately I’ve been struggling with writing assignments. Some of the essays I’ve written have been okay, but I keep making mistakes. I feel like I’m not doing anything right in my major. I’m not sure if I should be in English or something else, but I’m really passionate about the subject and want to do well. I’m hoping to talk to someone about how to improve and get help.
